name: Association for Development of Human and Community Rebuilding
briefDescription: Agriculture activities – dry land farming etc, Child development and protection, Disaster Risk Reduction, Disaster Management, Disaster Risk reduction, Relief & Reconstruction etc, Safe drinking water, Education & Literacy, Ecology – Environment & Forest, Hygiene promotion in community & School level, Health & Family welfare, Rain water harvesting, New and renewable energy, Nutrition, Rural Development & Poverty Alleviation, Urban Development & Poverty Alleviation, Women Development & empowerment, Capacity building training, Vocational training, Solid waste management, Advanced Alternate for livelihood, Livelihood skill enhancement training, Sanitation, Rural physical planning for vulnerable zone, Environmentally Responsible & Sustainable Water and Sanitation Systems, Cost Conscious Shelters for vulnerable people in Disasters Prone areas, Advocacy & campaign on issues, Linkage with departments.
